lines.text: This is amazing. You're amazing!
You couldn't keep us apart, because nothing you say could ever change the way I feel about her, ever!
Jody? Jody!
Beth!
Oh my gosh, I was going crazy, I didn't think I'd ever see you again!
The other girls don't really like Jody. I don't know why. I mean, I like her. There's just something about her.
It takes twenty-four hours for bruises to show. Tomorrow I'll wake up looking like an eggplant. This could cost you major dollars.
Just how dumb do you think I am?
Dumb enough to let a lizard crawl up your leg.
[Beth screams. Jody laughs]
And dumb enough to look!
You laugh like a horse.
You look like one.
Does your mother know you come here?
My mother? My mother probably thinks I'm still in the next room. You've heard about her haven't you?
Heard what?
You know Beth, when you lie your whole face twitches.
City girls.
You'll have to go for help. I'll just have to lay here.
You can't just lay there what about the tide?
What about the tide? How much time do I have, before I could drown?
You're not going to drown.
Are you scared?
No.
You are too.
I am not.
You know, there are a couple of cute boys there.
There just after your money.
Great now the bats know were here.
Bats? Oh my God!
Relax.
Say you'll climb the mountain.
No.
That's the second promise you made to me today.
What was the first?
Do you think she misses it?
What?
IT. You know.
Oh, right. They always miss it don't they?
Were they doing it, in the movie?
No, but the people in the cars were.
I don't want you thinking I'm dumb. I'm not dumb.
But I am, for saying it.
Jody!
City girl!
I told my mom, what happend to you. She didn't believe me.
They don't wanna know the truth. It's easier for them that way.
Don't get weird on me.
What's your name?
My name? Molly Morgan.
Are you accusing me of theft Easton?
Where'd you get the money?
Stole it from my mom's purse.
I don't believe you!
Remember our plan, keep your mouth shut.
She saved my life, she's a hero!
Yeah, well according to the Sheriff, your so called hero, can't walk into a store without stealing something.
Do they know where were going? Does anyone know? You didn't tell did you?
How could I tell, when I don't know?
Sorry there isn't more to do, except for tomorrow night of course.
Oh, it's the redneck.
Oh my God, Jody!
Beth, that's from when you tried to kill me with your bike.
That was a week ago. And that was your right shoulder. Come on Jody what happend?
Come back with me! Tell them the truth, it was self defense. Tell them how Ray was treating your mother.
They'll take Ray's side.
What are you, her mother?
Who do you think you are evil-kinevil?
Did you see Jody? I mean, is she okay?
I snuck out. I gotta get back before they notice I'm gone. It's like I'm under house arrest.
Me too, it's so childish.
I knew it.
Knew what?
I don't know but I knew it.
Jody's in danger and you're not doing anything!
Beth swear. Swear you won't say anything!
Are you angry with me? You are, I can tell.
I'm angry this happen to you.
When they come, tell them that we went boating and got lost. Nothing about Ray, and nothing about the gold.
I swear I'll come through for you, you can count on me.
You're not worth it.
No one knows the woods like I do.
I've got a great plan, it's all set in my mind.
All it really needed was a new motor, so I got one.
You got one? Who's motor was it?
Everybody thinks I'll wind up in jail. Well sorry folks, I'll have to dissapoint you.
Nobody ever believes me.
Don't worry about me. I'm pretty tough, I can take care of myself.
Jody get down from there!
Okay, if you say so.
Come on, let's get out of here.
